abstract: Andy Murray defeats Kei Nishikori to give Britain 3-1 win over Japan in first-round of Davis Cup tennis tournament; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray recovered from squandering a two-set lead to beat Kei Nishikori and give Britain, the defending Davis Cup champion, a 3-1 win over Japan in the first round in Birmingham, England.
snippet: Andy Murray recovered from squandering a two-set lead to beat Kei Nishikori and give Britain, the defending Davis Cup champion, a 3-1 win over Japan in the first round in Birmingham, England....
